title: section change based on cgpa
content: does pes change sections based on cgpa or sgpa in 4th/5th/6th sem? it seems unlikely but i heard it somewhere and now i can’t get it off my mind

comments.body:
After 1st year you are allotted your final sections based on SRN only. 
The only place where cgpa can come into play are for teacher, thus class, allotments for electives in the third year.
Does it mean for the next 2,3,4th sem, I’m with the same classmates?
Not based on cgpa, only based on SRN.
Not based on cgpa, but based on your name (SRN)

Nah nah 
IT wont be based on GPA…
Based on SRN
yes its like this in most engineering colleges.

This is not a coaching center lol chill, idk why u guys keep getting worried about the most irrelevant things.  
Lets say it is based on ur GPA, what u gonna do study better? That should be ur goal regardless of anything.
